alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); Northern Queens; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 5:29PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Queens, Kings and southwestern Nassau Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Flatbush, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jamaica, Flatbush, Valley Stream, Long Beach, Coney Island, Garden City, Lynbrook, Mineola, Woodmere, Rockaway Beach, Crown Heights, Kennedy Airport, Forest Hills, Canarsie and Bay Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Kings (Brooklyn); Northern Queens; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens
